text: Set yourself up for a good skin day by preparing your sleeping environment as well as your skin. Tie your hair up and wrap it in a scarf to prevent oils and product buildup from irritating your skin. Change your bedding to a clean set to avoid transferring bacteria onto your clean skin while you sleep. Wash your bedding without fabric softener, which leaves behind a pore-clogging residue. Use a pillowcase made of natural fabric, as it breathes better and doesn't trap oil as easily as man-made fabrics.
title: Is It Possible to Treat an Acne Breakout Overnight?

og.description: When your face breaks out in acne the night before an important event, tailor your basic skin-care routine for quick healing. Acne-prone skin requires products that deeply cleanse to eliminate bacteria while soothing inflammation.
